mapper.sql: id, order_car_id, order_car_no, type, inner_log, outer_log, remark, create_time, create_user, create_user_type, create_user_id, create_user_phone
mapper.select: select * from ( select #{orderCarNo} as orderCarNo, (case type when 1 then '已下单' when 2 then '已确认' when 3 then '待付款' when 4 then '已付款' when 5 then '已接单' when 100 then '已交付' when 113 then '已取消' else '' end) as typeStr, outer_log as outerLog, create_time as createTime from w_order_log where order_no = #{orderNo} union all select order_car_no as orderCarNo, (case type when 21 then '已装车' when 22 then '已卸车' when 23 then '已卸载' when 24 then '已入库' when 25 then '已出库' when 28 then '已支付' when 29 then '已收车' else '' end) as typeStr, outer_log as outerLog, create_time as createTime from w_order_car_log where order_car_no = #{orderCarNo} ) as shell order by shell.createTime
